readable.title: 2375924666_fee50f1cba
readable.content: A brown dog holding a foam bat aiming for a ball . A brown dog in front of a white fence with a blue and red bat-shaped object in its mouth . A brown dog is playing with a blue and red bat in his mouth . A brown dog plays with a toy bat hanging out its mouth . A long-haired dog is playing with a small , blue bat .
